question:
Recently, the Supreme Court delivered its verdict on Cauvery River water dispute. Which of the following States/UTs were the parties to the dispute?
  1. Tamil Nadu
  2. Karnataka
  3. Kerala
  4. Puducherry
Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation: The Cauvery dispute is one among several inter-state river disputes in India. The party to the dispute are Tamil Nadu, Karnataka, Kerala, and Puducherry. It was recently making news because the Supreme Court delivered its verdict on Cauvery river water sharing. The three-judge bench of the Supreme Court ordered it to provide 177.2 TMC water to Tamil Nadu and Karnataka will now get an additional 14.75 TMC as compared to the previous 2007 order, where it was directed to give 192 TMC to Tamil Nadu. Karnataka will now release 177.25 tmc ft of Cauvery water to Tamil Nadu from its inter-state Biligundlu dam.
